Key Match Events: The Pelicans led the Trail Blazers 82-79 entering the final period Monday, before visiting guards Anfernee Simons and Dalano Banton got to the rim repeatedly
Jordan Hawkins was vital for the Pelicans in the second half, going on a scoring binge that featured 22 second-half points.
He tallied 15 points in the fourth quarter alone, knocking down a handful of jumpers.
